sentences.sContent: The court of inquiry ruled that the crash was due to pilot error.
sentences.sCn: 调查法庭裁定飞机失事是由驾驶员的失误造成的。

sentences.sContent: She has been absent from work due to illness.
The restaurant’s success was due largely to its new manager.
sentences.sCn: 这家餐馆的成功很大程度上归功于新来的经理。

sentences.sContent: Attendance at the meeting was small, due in part to (= partly because of ) the absence of teachers.
sentences.sCn: 参加会议的人数不多，部分原因是教师缺席。
